timeline.message: test: Increase test coverage for DefaultNotificationManager
test: Increasing test coverage for DefaultProviderDataAccessor

timeline.bodyText: Is the comment here still needed?
timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: Small thing, but you could just check the isEmpty method here.
timeline.author: bamandel

replies.bodyText: I have assertEquals 0 in several places when checking for empty lists, I can go through and change all of them to isEmpty if thats a better solution
replies.author: ChomickiM

timeline.bodyText: This could also just be an isEmpty check. It may be clearer
timeline.author: bamandel

timeline.bodyText: I've seen this a couple times. You could abstract it into a private method like you did in the other test.
timeline.author: bamandel

timeline.bodyText: Not sure if it's the same for tests, but sonarqube generally prefers primitive types over their Object counterparts. Using boolean here may be preferred.
timeline.author: bamandel

replies.bodyText: Unless that would break the assertEquals, then this makes sense.
replies.author: bamandel

timeline.bodyText: This could be an isEmpty check
timeline.author: bamandel

timeline.bodyText: This chunk of asserts also looks like it's used in multiple places. A private method may help
timeline.author: bamandel

timeline.message: test: Improving tests based on PR feedback
